freenet.support
Interface XMLCharacterClasses

All Known Implementing Classes:
HTMLNode, HTMLNode.HTMLDoctype
public interface XMLCharacterClasses

This class contains various character classes from the XML 1.0 specification, 4th edition. The constants in this class are written in a form that allows easy conclusion in a Matcher pattern within square parantheses ('[' and ']').

Version:
$Id$
Author:
David Roden <bombe@freenetproject.org>
